history.narrative: Law 5-40, the “Fire and Casualty Act Amendment Act of 1983,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-111, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 5, 1983, and September 6, 1983, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on September 22, 1983, it was assigned Act No. 5-65 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
